short_summary: The CNSC has a requirement for Evaluation Services Consultant to provide evaluation support
description: The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission has a requirement to program evaluation support as wells as further implementing the function.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
### English Title
Evaluation Services Consultant - CNSC

### French Title
Expert-conseil en services d'évaluation - CCSN

## Reference Information

* Reference Number: PW-23-01027964
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 5000070461
* Publication Date: February 27, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 11, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)

## Tender Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

## Service Requirements

* **Evaluation & Performance Measurement Services**

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR)

## Request for Proposal Details

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Limited Tendering Reason: None

## Documentation and Contact Information

* Documentation: Available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/40681cc180a709c3c79042171d1373d9/5000070461_-_tsps_-_npp_-_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/40681cc180a709c3c79042171d1373d9/5000070461_-_tsps_-_npp_-_en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/b53c63ed96c6974119f00f384
